original_text:
There was nothing left after he had eaten;
    therefore his prosperity will not endure.
korean_text: 남기는 것이 없이 모두 먹으니 그런즉 그 행복이 오래 가지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: There was nothing left after he had eaten
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 먹고 난 후에는 아무것도 남지 않았다

sentences.original_text: therefore his prosperity will not endure.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그의 번영은 오래가지 못할 것이다
